headline: Does Cadence Design Systems Still Offer Value After Its Big AI Driven Run?
summary: If you have been wondering whether Cadence Design Systems is still worth buying after its big run over the last few years, you are not alone. This is exactly the kind of stock where valuation really matters. The share price is now around $317.94, after gaining 3.8% over the last week but slipping 5.2% over the past month, leaving it up 6.8% year to date and roughly flat over the last year despite a 98.0% gain over three years and 175.3% over five years. Recent attention has centered on...
